类型: Size: SmallColor: A Olive Bowl Tank Top
评论详情: Absolutely loving this tank top! 🍒 It's got such a fun Y2K vibe with the olive print that's perfect for summer. The fit is super flattering—nice and slim without being too tight. The material feels light and comfy, great for those hot days. Definitely a cute addition to my summer wardrobe! 😊 Can't wait to pair it with some high-waisted shorts or jeans. Overall, thumbs up for style and comfort!

类型: Size: SmallColor: A Olive Bowl Tank Top
评论详情: I love olives and was very excited to see such a cute design on a tank top. The tank top fits very well and is comfortable to wear for a long period of time. The logo has stayed on well even after multiple washes, and the tank top is overall a good fit.

Overall, I like the top. I loved the idea of the cute little clam shells on front. I'm 5'6" 133lbs and ordered a medium instead of my usual small and glad I did. The length is actually fine and sits right at or just below my belly button so not really a crop top. The neckline is ok - it reminds me of a little girl's top with thicker straps, one I likely wore as a kid. The graphics seems to be iron on versus part of the fabric but are applied well. We'll see how it does in the wash. The fabric is soft too, a smooth polyester versus a soft cotton. Cute top for summer.

类型: Size: SmallColor: A Olive Bowl Tank Top
评论详情: I got the olives tank top; got several compliments on it, definitely cute. It's polyester so the fabric feels super synthetic, but it wasn't see through like some reviews say. The design is an iron-on transfer which has a reflective sheen that I don't like. It's cute but the quality isn't there.  I'm 5'3", 130lbs and I got a small. It fit nicely with some room to spare, which I liked. It would absolutely stretch if you happened to order too small, depends in the fit you're looking for. The neckline is a little high, but that's fine.

类型: Size: MediumColor: A Shrimp Tank Top
评论详情: I adore this shirt! I love the shrimp design; it's very vibrant. The fabric is actually super stretchy and comfortable, although a bit sheer. It looks fine with a light colored bra underneath. There's a loose thread near the armpit, but other than that the shirt is lovely.

类型: Size: SmallColor: A Shell Tank Top
评论详情: I think the fit and material are good. The quality of the design is poor and seems like an iron on design that is kind of pixelated in print.
